  <style>
    :root{
      --bg-deep-space:#100C1F; --bg-glass-purple:rgba(155,89,182,.08);
      --text-color:#D1CDE0; --text-heading:#FFF; --primary-purple:#A060FF;
      --accent-magenta:#F857A6; --border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.1);
      --studio-green:#00FF88; --waveform-blue:#00D4FF
    }
    *{box-sizing:border-box; margin:0; padding:0}
    html{scroll-behavior:smooth}
    body{font-family:'Inter',system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,sans-serif; background:var(--bg-deep-space); color:var(--text-color); line-height:1.6; overflow-x:hidden}

    /* Dynamic Background */
    body::before{content:''; position:fixed; inset:0; z-index:-1;
      background:
        radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(160,96,255,.10) 0%, transparent 50%),
        radial-gradient(circle at 80% 20%, rgba(248,87,166,.10) 0%, transparent 50%),
        linear-gradient(315deg, var(--bg-deep-space) 0%, rgba(160,96,255,.05) 50%, var(--bg-deep-space) 100%);
      background-size:100% 100%, 100% 100%, 400% 400%;
      animation:cosmicFlow 20s ease infinite
    }
    @keyframes cosmicFlow{0%,100%{background-position:0% 50%,0% 50%,0% 50%}33%{background-position:30% 70%,70% 30%,50% 0%}66%{background-position:70% 30%,30% 70%,100% 50%}}

    /* Skip link */
    .skip-link{position:absolute; left:-9999px; top:auto; width:1px; height:1px; overflow:hidden}
    .skip-link:focus{left:16px; top:12px; width:auto; height:auto; background:#1b1333; color:#fff; padding:.6rem 1rem; border-radius:.5rem; outline:2px solid var(--studio-green)}

    /* Navbar (Quarto integration — use Quarto's built-in navbar)
   NOTE: In your _quarto.yml, set:

   website:
     navbar:
       pinned: true   # keeps the navbar visible; disables hide-on-scroll
       background: "#100C1F"  # already in your config

   We style Quarto's generated header here so we don't duplicate markup.
*/
#quarto-header{position:sticky; top:0; z-index:1100; backdrop-filter:blur(20px)}
#quarto-header .navbar{background:rgba(16,12,31,.95)!important; border-bottom:1px solid var(--border-color)}

/* Prevent Headroom auto-hide just in case it's enabled */
.headroom,.headroom--unpinned,.headroom--pinned{transform:none!important}

/* Offset anchor targets so fixed header doesn't cover them */
main section[id]{scroll-margin-top:84px}

/* Optional: tweak Quarto navbar logo height if used */
.navbar-brand img.navbar-logo{max-height:36px}

/* Hero */
    .hero{min-height:100vh; display:grid; place-items:center; text-align:center; padding-top:64px}
    .hero-logo{font-size:4rem; font-weight:800; background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--primary-purple),var(--accent-magenta),var(--studio-green)); -webkit-background-clip:text; -webkit-text-fill-color:transparent; filter:drop-shadow(0 0 24px rgba(160,96,255,.35))}
    .hero-slogan{font-size:1.25rem; opacity:.9; margin-top:8px}
    .hero-stats{display:flex; gap:50px; margin:32px 0}
    .stat-item{text-align:center}
    .stat-number{display:block; font-size:2.5rem; font-weight:800; color:var(--primary-purple); margin-bottom:6px; font-variant-numeric:tabular-nums}
    .stat-label{font-size:.95rem; opacity:.85}
    .cta-buttons{display:flex; gap:16px; justify-content:center; flex-wrap:wrap; margin-top:8px}
    .btn{padding:14px 26px; border-radius:999px; text-decoration:none; font-weight:600; display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:10px; border:2px solid transparent}
    .btn-primary{background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--primary-purple),var(--accent-magenta)); color:#fff}
    .btn-primary:hover{transform:translateY(-2px); box-shadow:0 12px 32px rgba(160,96,255,.35)}
    .btn-secondary{background:transparent; color:var(--text-color); border-color:var(--border-color)}
    .btn-secondary:hover{background:var(--primary-purple); border-color:var(--primary-purple); color:#fff}

    /* Sections */
    main section{padding:80px 0; content-visibility:auto; contain-intrinsic-size:1px 600px}
    .container{max-width:1200px; margin:0 auto; padding:0 20px}
    .section-header{text-align:center; margin-bottom:48px}
    .section-header h2{font-size:2.25rem; color:var(--text-heading); margin-bottom:10px}

    /* Quick Nav */
    .quick-nav{background:rgba(0,0,0,.2)}
    .nav-grid{display:grid; grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(260px,1fr)); gap:24px}
    .nav-card{background:var(--bg-glass-purple); border:1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius:20px; padding:26px; text-align:center; transition:transform .2s ease, box-shadow .2s ease, border-color .2s ease; color:inherit; text-decoration:none; position:relative; overflow:hidden}
    .nav-card::before{content:''; position:absolute; inset:0; left:-100%; background:linear-gradient(90deg,transparent,rgba(160,96,255,.12),transparent); transition:left .45s ease}
    .nav-card:hover{transform:translateY(-8px); border-color:var(--primary-purple); box-shadow:0 18px 36px rgba(160,96,255,.18)}
    .nav-card:hover::before{left:100%}
    .nav-card-icon{font-size:2rem; color:var(--primary-purple); margin-bottom:14px}
    .nav-card h3{color:var(--text-heading); font-size:1.25rem; margin-bottom:10px}

    /* Featured */
    .featured-grid{display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; gap:40px; align-items:center}
    .featured-content h3{font-size:2rem; color:var(--text-heading); margin-bottom:16px}
    .featured-content p{font-size:1.05rem; opacity:.9; margin-bottom:18px}
    .featured-media{position:relative; border-radius:20px; overflow:hidden; aspect-ratio:16/10}
    .featured-media img{width:100%; height:100%; object-fit:cover; transition:transform .3s ease}
    .featured-media:hover img{transform:scale(1.04)}
    .play-button{position:absolute; inset:auto auto 16px 16px; width:auto; height:auto; background:rgba(16,12,31,.7); border:1px solid var(--border-color); padding:10px 14px; border-radius:999px; color:#fff; cursor:pointer}
    .play-button i{margin-right:8px}

/* Spotify embed sizing */
.featured-media.has-embed{aspect-ratio:auto}
.featured-media.has-embed iframe{display:block; width:100%; height:352px; border:0}

    /* Player */
    .music-player{background:var(--bg-glass-purple); border:1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius:20px; padding:24px; margin:36px 0}
    .player-header{display:flex; align-items:center; gap:18px; margin-bottom:16px}
    .album-art{width:72px; height:72px; border-radius:10px; background:linear-gradient(45deg,var(--primary-purple),var(--accent-magenta)); display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:center; color:#fff; font-size:1.25rem}
    .track-info h4{color:var(--text-heading); margin-bottom:4px}
    .track-info p{color:var(--primary-purple); font-size:.9rem}
    .player-controls{display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:center; gap:18px}
    .control-btn{background:none; border:none; color:var(--text-color); font-size:1.1rem; cursor:pointer; padding:10px; border-radius:50%; transition:background .2s ease, color .2s ease}
    .control-btn:hover{color:var(--primary-purple); background:rgba(160,96,255,.1)}
    .play-btn{font-size:1.35rem; color:var(--primary-purple)}

    /* Newsletter */
    .newsletter{background:linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(160,96,255,.1), rgba(248,87,166,.1)); text-align:center}
    .newsletter-form{display:flex; max-width:520px; margin:20px auto 0; gap:12px; align-items:flex-start}
    .newsletter-form label{position:absolute; left:-9999px}
    .newsletter-form input{flex:1; padding:14px 18px; border:1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius:999px; background:rgba(255,255,255,.05); color:var(--text-color)}
    .newsletter-form input::placeholder{color:rgba(209,205,224,.65)}
    .newsletter .form-note{margin-top:8px; font-size:.85rem; opacity:.8}

    /* Footer */
    .footer{background:rgba(0,0,0,.5); border-top:1px solid var(--border-color)}
    .footer-content{display:grid; grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(220px,1fr)); gap:28px; margin-bottom:28px}
    .footer-section h4{color:var(--text-heading); margin-bottom:12px; font-size:1.05rem}
    .footer-section a{color:var(--text-color); text-decoration:none; display:block; margin-bottom:8px}
    .footer-section a:hover{color:var(--primary-purple)}
    .footer-socials{display:flex; justify-content:center; gap:18px; margin:12px 0 18px}
    .footer-socials a{color:var(--text-color); font-size:1.35rem}
    .footer-socials a:focus-visible{outline:2px solid var(--studio-green); outline-offset:3px}
    .footer p{text-align:center; opacity:.65; font-size:.9rem; padding-bottom:20px}

    /* Utilities */
    .fade-in{opacity:0; transform:translateY(30px); transition:opacity .6s ease, transform .6s ease}
    .fade-in.visible{opacity:1; transform:translateY(0)}

    /* Responsive */
    @media (max-width: 900px){
      .featured-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr; text-align:center}
    }
    @media (max-width: 768px){
      .hero-logo{font-size:2.5rem}
      .hero-stats{flex-direction:column; gap:18px}
      .newsletter-form{flex-direction:column}
    }

    /* Reduced motion */
    @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce){
      html{scroll-behavior:auto}
      body::before{animation:none}
    }
  </style>
</head>

  <script>
    // Helper: reduced‑motion check
    const prefersReduced = window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches;

    // Mobile menu toggle (accessible)
    const toggleBtn = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
    const navList   = document.getElementById('primary-nav');
    if (toggleBtn && navList) {
      const toggleMenu = () => {
        const isOpen = navList.classList.toggle('open');
        toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-expanded', String(isOpen));
        toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Close menu' : 'Open menu');
      };
      toggleBtn.addEventListener('click', toggleMenu);
      // Close on link click (use capture to catch early)
      navList.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        const t = e.target;
        if (t.tagName === 'A' && navList.classList.contains('open')) {
          navList.classList.remove('open');
          toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
          toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Open menu');
        }
      }, true);
      // Close on Escape
      document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
        if (e.key === 'Escape' && navList.classList.contains('open')) {
          navList.classList.remove('open');
          toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
          toggleBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Open menu');
          toggleBtn.focus();
        }
      });
    }

    // Animated statistics counter (respects reduced motion)
    function animateCount(el) {
      const target = Number(el.dataset.target || 0);
      if (!target || prefersReduced) { el.textContent = formatNum(target); return; }
      const duration = 1800;
      const start = performance.now();
      function step(now) {
        const p = Math.min(1, (now - start) / duration);
        const val = Math.floor(target * (0.2 + 0.8 * p));
        el.textContent = formatNum(val);
        if (p < 1) requestAnimationFrame(step);
      }
      requestAnimationFrame(step);
    }
    function formatNum(n) {
      if (n >= 1_000_000) return (n / 1_000_000).toFixed(1).replace(/\.0$/, '') + 'M+';
      return new Intl.NumberFormat().format(n);
    }
    document.querySelectorAll('.stat-number').forEach(animateCount);

    // Fade-in on scroll (IntersectionObserver)
    const io = ('IntersectionObserver' in window) ? new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) entry.target.classList.add('visible'); });
    }, { threshold: 0.18, rootMargin: '0px 0px -80px 0px' }) : null;
    document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in').forEach(el => io && io.observe(el));

    // Featured play button (demo only)
    const playBtn = document.querySelector('.play-button');
    if (playBtn) {
      playBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const icon = playBtn.querySelector('i');
        const isPlay = icon.classList.contains('fa-play');
        icon.classList.toggle('fa-play', !isPlay);
        icon.classList.toggle('fa-pause', isPlay);
        setTimeout(() => { icon.classList.add('fa-play'); icon.classList.remove('fa-pause'); }, 2800);
      });
    }

    // Newsletter form (client-side UX only)
    const form = document.querySelector('.newsletter-form');
    const note = document.querySelector('.form-note');
    if (form && note) {
      form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const email = /** @type {HTMLInputElement} */(form.querySelector('#email')).value.trim();
        if (!email) { note.textContent = 'Please enter a valid email.'; return; }
        note.textContent = 'Thanks! You\'ll receive healing music updates soon.';
        form.reset();
      });
    }
  </script>
